name: UPatternTool_RadialSettings
doc: Settings for Radial Patterns in the Pattern Tool

SpacingMode: Spacing Technique used to distribute Pattern Elements around the Circle/Arc
Count: Number of  Pattern Elements to place
StepSize: Fixed Increment (in Degrees) used to position Pattern Elements around the Circle/Arc
AngleShift: Fixed offset added to Start/End Angles
bOriented: If true, Pattern elements are rotated to align with the Circle tangent
